name: Taxi Driver to the Stars
description:
Developed as part of KrassJam 14

You're fresh out of cash, having just spent your last couple credits on an interstellar taxi license and a ticket to the Outer-Rim.  But with a few small business loans from some very friendly seeming creditors you should be able to start your new life as a Cabbie. 

Outrun bounty hunters, chart dangerous courses, and manage your finances!
